fraud_bool.description: Indicates whether the transaction is fraudulent (1) or not (0)

name_email_similarity.description: Similarity between the customer's name and their email

prev_address_months_count.description: Number of months the customer has lived at their previous address

current_address_months_count.description: Number of months the customer has lived at their current address

days_since_request.description: Number of days since the last request

intended_balcon_amount.description: The intended amount to be transferred to the bank account

zip_count_4w.description: Number of transactions from the same zip code in the last 4 weeks

velocity_6h.description: Number of transactions in the last 6 hours

velocity_24h.description: Number of transactions in the last 24 hours

velocity_4w.description: Number of transactions in the last 4 weeks

bank_branch_count_8w.description: Number of transactions at the bank branch in the last 8 weeks

date_of_birth_distinct_emails_4w.description: Number of distinct emails associated with the same date of birth in the last 4 weeks

credit_risk_score.description: Credit risk score of the customer

email_is_free.description: Whether the email used is a free email service (1) or not (0)

value_dict.0: The email used is not a free email service
value_dict.1: The email used is a free email service

phone_home_valid.description: Whether the home phone number is valid (1) or not (0)

value_dict.0: The home phone number is not valid
value_dict.1: The home phone number is valid

phone_mobile_valid.description: Whether the mobile phone number is valid (1) or not (0)

value_dict.0: The mobile phone number is not valid
value_dict.1: The mobile phone number is valid

bank_months_count.description: Number of months the customer has been with the bank

has_other_cards.description: Whether the customer has other cards (1) or not (0)

value_dict.0: The customer does not have other cards

proposed_credit_limit.description: Proposed credit limit for the customer

foreign_request.description: Whether the request is from a foreign country (1) or not (0)

value_dict.0: The request is not from a foreign country
value_dict.1: The request is from a foreign country

value_dict.INTERNET: The transaction was made on the internet
value_dict.TELEAPP: The transaction was made via a teleapp

session_length_in_minutes.description: Length of the session in minutes

device_os.description: Operating system of the device used

value_dict.other: The operating system of the device is other
value_dict.windows: The operating system of the device is Windows
value_dict.macintosh: The operating system of the device is Macintosh
value_dict.linux: The operating system of the device is Linux
value_dict.x11: The operating system of the device is X11

keep_alive_session.description: Whether the session was kept alive (1) or not (0)

value_dict.0: The session was not kept alive

device_distinct_emails_8w.description: Number of distinct emails used from the same device in the last 8 weeks

device_fraud_count.description: Number of fraudulent transactions made from the same device

value_dict.3: The transaction was made in March
value_dict.5: The transaction was made in May
value_dict.4: The transaction was made in April
value_dict.2: The transaction was made in February
value_dict.7: The transaction was made in July
value_dict.6: The transaction was made in June
value_dict.1: The transaction was made in January
value_dict.0: The transaction was made in an unknown month

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in financial fraud detection.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the bank transaction, please predict if the transaction is fraudulent.
prompt.answer_prompt: The transaction is fraudulent[1] or The transaction is not fraudulent[0]?

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in finance.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the bank transaction, please predict the income.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in credit risk assessment.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the bank transaction, please predict the credit risk score.
prompt.answer_prompt: What is the predicted credit risk score?

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in credit limit assessment.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the bank transaction, please predict the proposed credit limit.
prompt.answer_prompt: What is the predicted proposed credit limit?

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in device fraud detection.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the bank transaction, please predict the device fraud count.
prompt.answer_prompt: What is the predicted device fraud count?

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in payment type classification.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the bank transaction, please predict the payment type.
prompt.answer_prompt: Is it Payment type AB[0], AA[1], AC[2], AD[3], or AE[4]?

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in employment status classification.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the bank transaction, please predict the employment status.
prompt.answer_prompt: Is it Employment status CC[0], CA[1], CB[2], CF[3], CD[4], CE[5], or CG[6]?

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in housing status classification.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the bank transaction, please predict the housing status.
prompt.answer_prompt: Is it Housing status BC[0], BB[1], BA[2], BE[3], BD[4], BF[5], or BG[6]?
